visual.name: KPI
visual.description: KPI by Powerviz is a powerful custom visual for Power BI that allows users to visualize and create eye-catching and advanced Key Performance Indicators (KPIs). It contains 16 different layers and over 40 different chart variations that you can create. Using advanced text editor and on-object layer you can create pixel perfect designed visuals in your next report. The best part about KPI is no prior learning is required. This add-on provided all the key features you need to create a fully dynamic KPI and sparklines.
